name: Gentle Cleansing Foam
about: What it is: A non-stripping gel cleanser that thoroughly cleanses pores and washes away excess oil, pollution, and other residue...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Uneven Texture, and Oiliness..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hydra Capture Complex: Helps skin retain moisture even after cleansing.- Herbal Extract Blend (Raspberry Fruit, Mulberry Leaf, Mountain Yam, Cocoa): Refreshes, rejuvenates and softens..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, and sulfates SLS & SLES...What Else You Need to Know: A daily gel-to-foam cleanser formulated with traditional Korean herbal ingredients and plants to deep cleanse without stripping skin. The cushiony lather pulls dirt, grime and impurities from pores while softening skin. The multitasking formula can be used as part of a double cleansing routine or alone for visibly glowing skin...Clinical Results: Based on a 3-day independent consumer study on 30 women ages 30-49:.- 96% agreed the foam feels gentle on the skin without any irritation.- 93% agreed their skin feels soft after cleansing.- 83% agreed their skin feels moisturized after cleansing
ingredients: -Hydra Capture Complex: A complex of four herbal ingredients to help skin stay hydrated..-Mulberry Leaf Extract and Mountain Yam Extract: Help soften skin while cleansing...Glycinate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Acrylates/Beheneth-25 Methacrylate Copolymer, Peg-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate, Sodium Chloride, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Fragrance / Parfum, Isostearic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Butylene Glycol, Limonene, Disodium Edta, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Tetrasodium Edta, Coix Lacryma-Jobi Ma-Yuen Seed Extract, Citrus Unshiu Peel Extract, Castanea Crenata (Chestnut) Shell Extract, Linalool, Spirodela Polyrhiza Extract, Dioscorea Japonica Root Extract, Dextrin, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Salicornia Herbacea Extract, Morus Alba Leaf Extract, Angelica Keiskei Extract, Citric Acid, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Lather two pumps of cleansing foam and massage into damp skin morning and night to thoroughly remove dust and pollution. Rinse with lukewarm water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first ever cleansing oil so I donu2019t know much but I absolutely love the way it cleanses. It does the job for pores and it smells so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure but I think this made me break out, the smell is good but VERY strong, also be careful with your eyes because this burn A LOT! It does clean your face really good but itu2019s a no for me!

reviews.review_title: Not a fan of the cleansing foam.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Probably fine for double cleanse but does not clean nose pores on it's own and for that I would not purchase.  Also felt it was drying.  I am a fan of Sulwhasoo oil cleanser.
Love this cleansing foam. It is so gentle and doesnu2019t strip the skin. My face feels soft after using it. It also does a decent job with makeup removal. Lastly, I like the light scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m gonna be honest, didnu2019t remove my make up that wellufffc probably my fault but it got in my eye and it made it hard to see for a while but the very next day my skin was covered in bumps and was very sensitive made me break out terriblyufffc broken out my skin was covered in bumps and was very sensitive made me break out terribly

reviews.review_title: My Must Have Step 2 For Squeaky Clean Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For reference I have mature, oily and pimple-prone skin.  Since using this product and Sulwhasoo Oil Cleanser as my go-to Step 1 to clean skin, my skin texture has gotten much smoother.  Following up with a good face routine (toner, serum, creams, sunscreen) my skin has been looking much healthier where I'm finding myself being more comfortable having makeup free days.  I'd also like to point out that I live in Hawaii and the weather although beautiful, it's very harsh on the skin.  Living in California I rarely had blemishes and my skin was very manageable without the need to double cleanse, use toner and serums.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and wanted to try this as I loved their makeup remover and face mask. After one use I noticed significant dryness on my face and made my face feel tight. Sadly this didnu2019t work out for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really good cleanser to remove makeup, not very nice for a morning cleanser but fairly good for evening cleansing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My expectations for my cleansers are not very high. However, when I find a cleanser that is exceptional it is always nice. I used my points to purchase a set with this cleanser and other sulwhasoo products. I have used this cleanser for the past week. I intentionally only used this cleanser to see how it performs. I love how much this cleanser foams and I love how gentle this cleanser is. I agree with the claims of the cleanser. It is so gentle, but my skin feels so clean after using it. I even let my 70 year old mom use it (she has shingles on her face and her skin is very sensitive). She loved the cleanser so much she put it in her skincare drawer and I had to get it back lol. It has a pleasant citrusy, orange/grapefruite scent that I love. I can see me purchasing the full size once the small size I have runs out. I donu2019t see a difference in other benefits such as wrinkles, pores, or brightening but it also never made any claims to improve this. If you are looking for a great cleanser that lathers, deep cleanses, softens, but is very gentle, you would love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It may be gentle on skin but not safe for eyes, where I need waterproof makeup removal to be gentlest. Seems effective removing makeup and sunscreen without overdrying, if that's your concern.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for a few years now. Great product. Even though I have oily skin, I still do not like cleansers that makes me feel like it stripped away all my oil and moisture after cleansing. It leaves your skin soft after cleansing. I tried a few other cleansers here and there but always found myself going back to this one.

reviews.review_title: Not safe for sensitive skin types
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this product broke me out terribly. I used it along with the cleansing oil (and then for a while, on its own) for over a month. My skin was super irritated and I have pimples all over my forehead, cheeks, and chin that refuse to go away. Iu2019ve stopped using the product now for a few days and my skin is starting to clear and recover.   I have sensitive acne prone combination skin. I realized itu2019s the fragrance that upset my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried quite a few cleansers the past year, and this by far us the BEST one for dry skin. Just read the ingredients and you can see why itu2019s so luxurious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Huge fan! Cleans my skin without drying me out. I've tried many other Korean cleansing oils and this is by far my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser. One pump is enough for a nice lather and a thorough cleansing. Doesn't leave a film. I've noticed less black heads and clogged pores. ud83eudd29

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Works pretty well and a little goes a long way but very strong fragrance!

reviews.review_title: Lovely scent and light on skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the consistency and the scent of this cleanser. I have always heard such good things about Sulwhasoo, and I so far like this product! It's so gentle on the skin and it smells like citrusy ginseng!! But the scent is not overpowering, it just smells and feels refreshing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes such a long way, like half a pump is more than enough! My face feels so clean and fresh without feeling stripped after using this. (I also love the smell of this face wash). So gentile and effective, hasn't broken me out !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted the SULWHASOO gentle cleansing facial wash. I just love the way it makes my skin feel when Iu2019m done washing my face. It foams up so well and really washes nicely. My skin feels so soft, but not dried out and it feels very clean and that all my make up is removed. I use it and night and my skin has never looked better. I donu2019t get any breakouts from this facial wash, and my skin looks hydrated and feels amazing. This is probably the best facial cleanser that I have found. I do love this brand and have tried other products from them and they are one of the best. Iu2019m using this now that itu2019s summertime, but Iu2019m excited to use it through the fall and winter as my skin tends to get more dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free it feels good on the skin and leaves skin feeling softer and smoother no smell that i can notice doesnu2019t take much to use it would definitely recommend using this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sulwhasoo Gentle Cleansing Foam: Texture: light and gelatinous without fragrance I started using this Cleansing foam for a week and I really liked the results, after washing my face very well with this foam my skin feels clean and fresh and giving it more it breathes into my pores, it is a foam that does not dry out the skin at all and leaves the skin much softer and brighter. I also love that it has its pump to avoid excessive use of the product. I like to use it as indicated, during the mornings and nights before starting my skin care routine to prepare my skin with a deep cleanse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love that a small amount goes a long way. Love that it foams up, leaving the skin squeaky clean. Takes off make up real well. I have acne prone skin so itu2019s help with that as well. Also has a pleasant smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m really impressed the cleanser from Sulwhasoo.  It has a light gel texture that lather up into a nice light foam, cleaning the face and washing off easily.  The cleanser is very gentle and remove dirt and excess oil without drying out the skin.  Skin feels soft and clean.  Love it.

reviews.review_title: Very gentle on the skin, very good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Sulwhasoo Gentle Cleansing Foam and Concentrated Ginseng Renewing Serum since last two years now and I am absolutely impressed. Everything Iu2019ve tried  from Sulwasoo has the light and airy texture, and the cleanser creates a rich lather that feels incredibly luxurious on the skin. It glides effortlessly, removes makeup and impurities without stripping my already dry skin of its natural oils. After rinsing, my face feels clean and soft, not tight or dry like with other cleansers. My skin looks radiant and smooth. The herbal scent is calming, making it a pleasant part of my daily skincare routine. Overall, just like every product from Sulwasoo, it's a fantastic cleanser that not only cleans but also nourishes, leaving my skin balanced and looking healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foam cleanser, it leaves my skin super soft, more hydrated, it has helped me a lot with dark spots to fade them, my skin after using this cleanser feels more radiant and fresher, it is my new favorite in my day and night routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing foam cleaner. It form amazing lather and clean my skin through. Feel so moist and soft after cleaning. Smell is feels little lemon kind but not bad way. I feel itu2019s one of the good cleansing form in market, you must give a try to it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser itu2019s soothing to my skin and a little goes a long way. It has no fragrance and helps with dark sports my new favorite. I also like the dispense to avoid over using. Makes my pores look smaller.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There's nothing like an amazing facial cleanser and this one is divine! I usually do a double cleansing, starting with an oil or balm to remove my makeup gently, but Sulwhasso Gentle Cleansing foam actually removes my makeup on the first wash, leaving my skin feeling so clean and soft. This blows me away because my skin does not feel stripped or dry afterwards at all, but it is a powerful cleanser at the same time. My skin has been looking bright, my pores can breathe and I haven't seen a single blemish since I started using this! My skin can be somewhat reactive to new cleansers, but so far it's nothing but a joyous experience. I definitely recommend this to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As its name suggests, this cleanser is truly gentle. It lathers well and creates foamy bubbles. I appreciate that it doesn't strip all the natural oils from my face, leaving no intense feeling after washing. I also love its pleasant ginseng scent, which is not overly strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS CLEANSING FOAM!! It foams up so nicely but is also so gentle on the skin. I feel like my skin is super clean and refreshed after using this cleanser. It also doesn't leave my skin feeling dry and stripped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gentle cleansing foam has been amazing! I have been using it for a week or so now and have really liked the results thus far. It has made my skin feel super clean and moisturized after using! Doesnu2019t break me out which I appreciate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Sulwhasoo Gentle Cleansing Foam feels gentle on my skin when applied and after rinsing it off it didn't make my skin feel stripped. My skin feels soft and moisturized after cleansing. It has nice foamy bubbles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect gentle cleanser! I love how it gently foams and removes oil without stripping my skin too much. It also has a super pleasant and gentle scent. The pump is a plus too- great for double cleansing and I don't want to use both hands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Sulwhasoo Gentle Cleansing Foam boasts a gel-to-foam texture and a subtle, fresh scent. It effectively cleanses the skin, helping to maintain clarity and remove impurities. This gentle cleanser leaves the complexion feeling soft and looking radiant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using a Sulwhasoo product and my skin is very happy for it! I use a thick, oil based cream to remove my makeup and finally having a cleanser that removes that oil-y feeling along with residual makeup has been great! I love how it foams up and feels like it offers a great deep clean. It also has a wonderful but gentle balsam/pine scent that is quite relaxing when winding down in the evening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Sulwhasoo Gentle Cleansing Foam is a gel cleanser that feels so good and soothing on my skin! It has great lather and feels soft and silky. My face feels thoroughly clean yet remains hydrated. There is no stripped feeling at all. There is a mild herbal scent but not really detectable and is pleasant. After daily use, my face feels smoother, cleaner, softer and more hydrated. This is one of the best gel cleansers Iu2019ve tried and is up there as an all time favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried this cleansing foam and it worked wonders on my skin. It left my face feeling incredibly hydrated and kept it oil-free for a long time. My skin looked really fresh and rejuvenated. I highly recommend this product to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sulwhasoo is the pinnacle of Korean skincare. An eye cream of theirs was my entrance into the brand. This cleanser is foamy and nourishing and doesnu2019t strip my skin. Itu2019s rare to find a formulation so gentle that also foams.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Gentle Cleansing Foam! Gets all my makeup off even eye makeup and leaves my skin squeaky clean without being overdrying. I like the packaging. No strong scent. No breakouts from using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleansing foam is gentle enough to clean well without irritating my sensitive skin. My face feels nice and hydrated afterwards, it doesnt feel too dry and parched afterwards. Compared to other cleansers this one makes my face consistently soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am fan of Korean skincare and this Sulwhasoo ginseng gentle cleanser is so nice. It has a light ginseng scent and makes me feel really calm and relaxed. it is very gentle and makes my skin feel hydrated and soft. It also removes my makeup and sunscreen effectively without making my skin feel tight or dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product works so well with my skin I double cleanse my skin morning and night and it leaves my skin feeling so nice and clean

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product from Shuwaskoo, I wash my face 2 times a day so was excited to try this product. After a squirt of cleanser I rub along my face and wash and pat dry. My skin instantly feels softer and very cleansed. Very impressed. Also it doesnu2019t have an overpowering scent which I love. Would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser, it's perfect for double cleansing and it cleans your pores very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to in my daily 2 step face wash regimen.   It has a light, clean scent, removes all my makeup, and even waterproof mascara.  I no longer have blackheads on my nose.  I prefer an oil with a pump over a balm with a scooper.  The key to making this work is to massage it in alone for at least a minute before wetting with water to emulsify.  I rinse and then use a gentle face wash for dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've incorporated this cleanser into my skincare routine, and it has made a noticeable difference. Not only it cleans my skin, but the lather also effectively removes dirt, grime, and impurities from my pores while simultaneously softening my skin. This multitasking formula can be used as part of a double cleansing routine or on its own, and the result is always a visibly glowing skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's really good. I don't think it's 'gentle', however.  I was personally trying to find a foam that had some power to it and this was it. Not harsh by any means but it cleans effectively. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very subtle but amazing smell. A little goes a long way, Iu2019ve tried this product for almost a week and it didnu2019t break me out. I do have an acne prone skin so that was very important to me. It is very gentle and doesnu2019t lather that much but it will leave your skin clean and refreshed without drying it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased under my own volition & with my money in place of Ordinary foaming. Iu2019ll never go back to the  Ordinary. I love it! My hubby loves this and he has turned down the repurchase of dozens of low to lux cleansers in the past with only 2 other exceptions. To the people attacking the brand for the u201cnewu201d add of fragrance and the impact on health: sorry to burst the Hate Bandwagon bubble but there was added fragrance in the ingredients as far back as 2013. If you praised it then, the new formulation should not be an issue for you UNLESS itu2019s the actual scent itself. This product is lovely, Iu2019ve used a full bottle and will rebuy. I love the scent it reminds me of Bal Du2019Afrique. It cleanses thoroughly but doesnu2019t leave skin tight. Itu2019s moisturizing without leaving a film. It works with fingers, manual brushes, sponges, electronic brushes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gel-to-foam cleanser gently cleanses removing makeup, dirt and debris while not drying or stripping the skin. One pump is all you need and once you add water it emulsifies into a rich foaming lather. It contains Sulwhasoo's signature Hydra Capture Complex which features 4 herbal ingredients to help skin stay hydrated while Mulberry Leaf Extract and Mountain Yam Extract help to soften the skin while cleansing. I personally have been loving this cleanser used as a stand alone product, but it works nicely as a second step in a double-cleansing routine as well. It's rich foam removes my makeup like magic and leaves my skin feeling soft and clean, and looking healthy and radiant. Cart worthy for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Sulwhasoo cleansing foam.  It goes on very nicely and creates a good amount of suds.  Best of all a little bit goes a long way with it.  I have been using it on my morning routine.  It does have some fragrance to it, but is a nice mild scent.  I can best describe it as an earthy scent.  I have combination skin and it works great with my skin.  It wakes me up nicely and leaves my skin clean and refresh.  I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sulwhasoo Gentle Cleansing Foam works very well at cleansing my face. Even though it is a gentle cleanser, I feel my face is very clean after using. After using, I had no break outs or irritation. The smell is a citrusy clean fragrance. It comes in an easy to dispense bottle. Overall, I like the way this cleanser works on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this daily in my routine. I love the feeling it has on my face and neck when applying and the feel afterwards. Very Studsy and moisturizing on my face. I use once daily in the morning which helps me start my day on the right foot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this sulwhasoo gentle cleansing foaming face wash! I love all sulwhasoo products Iu2019ve tried and this one is no exception! Feels so luxurious, amazing quality, and cleanses my face really well without leaving it feeling stripped or dry. Would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very gentle foam for washing and perfectly removes dirt from the face and even cosmetics, without drying out the skin or irritating it.  I really like using this foam twice a day.

I absolutely love this product. I'm already seeing improvement in my skin since I started using this. It foams up nicely and leaves my skin clear and clean. It doesn't irritate my skin and it doesn't really have a smell. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just like its name, this cleanser is quite gentle. It is the kind of cleanser that doesn't make your face feel tight after washing. Perfect for my skin type, but it might not be powerful enough for acne-prone skin. It also has a light, pleasant smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cleanser has a smooth, creamy texture that feels soothing on the skin. It lathers mildly, providing a gentle cleanse without being too harsh. The application is easy, and it rinses off effortlessly, leaving no residue behind.

This cleanser smells so good and is very gentle on my skin. I have sensitive skin and this seems to just melt my makeup off and make my skin glisten. I love using it twice a day every day. The foam is just so nice on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This company is very well-known and high-end and I love it! The cleansing gel was luxurious, Light and effective. The scent was not overpowering, but definitely present. It was gentle, but did its job and I am very happy with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This gentle cleansing foam from Sulwhasoo is absolutely perfect.  This cleans and leaves my skin so soft and hydrated too. The foam is great and really gets into hard to clean spots. I absolutely love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: 've been using this gel cleanser, and it's amazing! It cleans my pores thoroughly without stripping my skin. My combination skin feels soft, moisturized, and never irritated. The improvement in my skin's texture and hydration is noticeable. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a gentle yet effective cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s incredibly hard to find a cleanser that nourishes and hydrates my combination skin, but this product does an incredible job at catering to what my skin needs. My skin doesnu2019t feel stripped or dry. It provides a nice lather. My skin feels clean, soft, and smooth. My skin loves it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skip this one!  Very overpriced, too much comes out of the pump, nothing special at all.

reviews.review_title: Makes my skin feel so soft and clean!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a gentle and effective cleanser! I pair it with an oil based cleanser as a second step to make sure my skin is fully clean, and it leaves my skin feeling really smooth and hydrated. The only cleansing foam I use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favourite cleaners. I have sensitive and dry skin and this leaves my face feeling so soft and smooth. I also really like the scent of it. The best cleanser Iu2019ve ever used. Itu2019s gentle but effective and I always feel like my skin is feeling fresh after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Big fan of the Sulwashoo brand as a whole! This gentle cleansing foam is a great addition to their line up. My skin feels clean and clear after using - I do find it to be slightly drying, but kind of expected with a foaming cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this cleansing foam and it exceeded my expectations! The product comes out in a gel and once mixed with water, turns into a rich foam. After rinsing it off, my skin felt moisturized, with pores minimized and and even tone. Will definitely be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sulwhasoo's Gentle Cleansing Foam is amazing! It leaves my skin feeling so soft and clean, without drying it out. It's gentle yet really works, perfect for everyday use. My skin looks refreshed and radiant every time I use it. I absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorites brand seriously love it , love their products. This cleansing foam is a must try , it creates rich foam with just a pump , feeling fresh and cool while applying on face , after wash face , my faces feels so clean and smooth . No tightening, no dry feeling . Recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVEEEEEEE THIS CLEANSER ! Iu2019ve been using this cleaner for a few days and yes itu2019s gentle but works! Itu2019s not overpowering with fragrance and it doesnu2019t strip the skin of essential oils. I am definitely adding this to my goto cleansers from now on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great cleanser and new addition to my skincare routine! I love how gentle it is and lathers up so nicely. Itu2019s so fun to use because it makes my skin feel really nice and has a very pleasant scent as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really loved trying out this cleanser. I love how it foams up and the feel on my skin. It feels so gentle and makes my skin so cleans and fresh. I also like how this helps with the fullness in my skin and uneven texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this foam cleanser day and night. I love how it removes dirt and excess makeup without over drying my skin. Itu2019s lightweight and because it foams, you only need a little bit. My skin feels wonderful after using this. Itu2019s also very gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m extremely impressed with how well this foaming cleanser from Sulwhasoo works with my skin. I love how deeply it cleans without the drying effect. The light foam creates a rich lather and gently removes makeup, oily buildup, dirt and grime. Iu2019ve been using this twice daily as my regular cleanser and have been extremely pleased with how healthy and rejuvenated my skin looks and feels. Adding this to my skincare routine has made a noticeable difference in the overall softness and suppleness of my skin. It also has a light, botanical scent which I also find very refreshing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this face wash! Every Sulwashoo product I have used has done wonders for my skin. There is truly not a bad product from this brand! This face wash lathers so nicely on the skin. It produces a foam and gently but very effectively cleanses the skin! My face felt clean and smooth but not stripped! Love this cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser as a step for double cleansing. It works well with getting my mascara off. That's usually an issue with other cleansers.  Using it on no makeup days, my skin feels great without any irritation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser, I've been using it for the past 2 years straight! I have sensitive and dry skin but this does not give me any irritation and leaves my face feeling clean. I also really like the scent of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For the first few uses I LOVED this! After a few weeks of use however it ruined my skin. My face was red and blotchy and burned when I put on my regular moisturizer so I stopped using this product. After I stopped using it my entire face was as dry as the Sahara desert and was sandpaper for about a week. Do not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately I really wanted to like this product. I loved the feeling of it, but it unfortunately caused a lot of small red raised bumps on my chin and forehead. I am already acne prone, and itu2019s similar to acne but more irritated.  more prorat

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: so so so good- not stripping for my dry skin and the scent is lovely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleansing foam is Haven lol , absolutely love everything about it , a bit on the pricey side.. but worth the splurge

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this off and on for years. I always come back to. Itu2019s light and foamy and doesnu2019t leave any residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Enjoyed the feel and the natural herbal smell, unfortunately it broke me out. Stopped use and tried again and my skin had another reaction.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased the mini and Iu2019ll probably be buying a full size in the future. Cleanse of makeup like nobodyu2019s business and doesnu2019t leave my skin feeling dry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not an incentivized review. I received a sample of this and decided to try the smaller version. The cleansing foam suds well and removes stubborn mascara leaving a soft finish plus a lot goes long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Too irritating, I think it has some sort of citrus or citrus scent. Did not work on my sensitive dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The most luxurious cleanser! The smell, texture, lather & gentleness is EVERYTHING!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. The reviews on here are confusing bc it seems Sephora combined reviews for two items. This is not an oil cleanseru2014it is foam. I received it as a sample and immediately came to buy it. Itu2019s amazing! I will continue to repurchase. You only need like a small drop bc it works into quite a foaming lather. Itu2019s amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this cleanser! I picked it up because I was curious about the brand and this makes me feel so amazing. I do feel like I need to moisturize a bit more with this product but I cannot rave about this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not really sure why this product received so many negative reviews. For me personally, I have had a great experience. This will be my forever go-to product (unless the production changes somehow) for my very sensitive skin.  It is gentle, lasts so long, you only need a small amount for each wash which goes a long way. Would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is a normal cleansing foam I tried better ones nothing special

Really great cleanser! Iu2019m a big fan of La Roche Posay cleansers and this was an awesome substitute. Itu2019s gentle and lightly foams but still has cleaning power. Smells like mandarins so it might be strong for those who donu2019t like citrus smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser for dry/combo skin. Cleans  without stripping. I'll repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Worst foaming cleanser I've ever used!! It's so fragrant and it broke me out so terribly. Would not repurchase!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. Super gentle on my sensitive skin. Definitely would buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing cleanser , not drying , non irritating . I have dehydrated in the winter and normal skin all year round .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! Buy it! The smell was good to me. The way my skin felt and looked afterwards let me know that this is a quality product. I purchased a serum also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got it from the rewards bazaar or whatever but ive NEVERHad any problems with any skincare but this has made my face so irritated and inflamed itu2019s burning hot on my skin rn and I have dry patches do not recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself worked well.  But it has a ginger/botanical scent that I just canu2019t get past.  If you donu2019t mind that sort of scent, youu2019ll probably like it just fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved it so much the packaging was beautiful, I had so much acne before I a started using it and it cleared it up.  Iu2019m not using it any more because itu2019s expensive but I do recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The pump is broken and I just got the bottle today :( after unscrewing the top I got the oil out to use for a cleanse and the product felt nice but super disappointing that the pump dispenser is already broken before a single use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best face cleanser I have tried. It is very gentle on the skin. Only need a drop and it foams. Lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this cleanser so far. Itu2019s great for days when youu2019re wearing makeup, it dissolves foundation much like an oil cleansing would. A staple in my routine the last few weeks!

reviews.review_title: Great cleanser with a light scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for a few weeks now and it has been working great to cleanse my skin and remove any makeup without having to double cleanse. The scent is not overpowering

reviews.review_title: New formulation a miss for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It appears Sephora combined this product with reviews from the cleansing oil. This is the gentle cleansing FOAM. This is my third bottle and also the first of the new reformulation. I am disappointed as I loved the former formula. It feels the same but now it has a heavy citrus smell. Unnecessary fragrance in skin care is shown to be endocrine disruptors that messes with development and reproduction. I will keep this product but I won't buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only used this face wash twice now but I really like it. So far itu2019s doing great and leaves my face glowing without feeling dry. I switched over from the rice wash from Tatcha to try it.  thistbecause I heard it ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. Feels very nice, pleasant smell and give a very clean hydrated feeling afterwards.
This product works well but unfortunately burned my skin. I have sensitive, acne prone skin and use actives including retinoids

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this to double cleanse with another cleanser so I can't tell you if this product alone will do everything you need it to. It smells like a christmas tree candle, which I personally do not mind since it does not irritate my very sensitive skin. It definitely won't dry out your skin, leaves it moisturized, but I wouldn't use this alone to clean pores.
